attributes.action: Clean our streets of dog dirt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dog dirt is the most disgusting thing in our society allows, every single day walking the kids to school we have to dodge an obstacle course of dog dirt and I don't know what these dogs eat but scaping dog dirt off shoes just makes me want to puke.

It is time politicians got out their cars and saw the state of our streets and finally took real action to clean up the mess.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
